scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules || true && rm -rf client/node_modules || true && rm -rf lambdas/node_modules
scripts.preinstall: cd client && yarn install && cd ../lambdas; yarn install
scripts.db:setup: cd lambdas && yarn sls dynamodb install
scripts.start:db: cd lambdas && yarn sls dynamodb start
scripts.backup: cd lambdas && sls invoke --stage dev -f getGroups > ../groups.json
